messages.text: Release 2025.7 is staged. Give the green light if dashboards look good.
Shoutout to the observability crew—the new CI board is 🔥.
Two enterprise trials asked for MathLab onboarding—forwarding notes.
Funnels are tightening. Let's push the guided tour experiment next.
Edge cache purged after deploy 2025-02-19. Ping if anomalies pop up.
